scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf dist && npm ci
scripts.check-git: node -e "const {execSync} = require('child_process'); try { const status = execSync('git status --porcelain', {encoding: 'utf8'}); if (status.trim()) { console.error('Working directory not clean'); process.exit(1); } const branch = execSync('git branch --show-current', {encoding: 'utf8'}).trim(); if (branch !== 'master') { console.error('Not on master branch'); process.exit(1); } } catch (e) { console.error('Git check failed:', e.message); process.exit(1); }"
scripts.bump: npm run check-git && npm version patch --no-git-tag-version
scripts.commit-version: node -e "const {execSync} = require('child_process'); const pkg=require('./package.json'); execSync('git add package.json package-lock.json', {stdio:'inherit'}); execSync('git commit -m \"bump kanban-app version to ' + pkg.version + '\"', {stdio:'inherit'})"
scripts.release: npm run build && npm run bump && npm run commit-version && npm run tag
